CITY OF NEW YORK

And

February 21, 1940
WASJ

WNYK

WNYN
WNYO
Mr# Frank E. Schooley,
The National Association
of Educational Broadcasters,
University of Illinois,
Urbana, Illinois#
My dear Schooley*
I found your note when I returned about frequency modulation
coming in fast.
I am inclined to go along with you, but the answer of my
Engineer is, "fast for Police, Fire, Aviation, Educational Stations, but
not for the general public.”
MSN/cb
Sincerely,
vAXJ
Director.
NEW YORK
WORLD’S FAIR 1039
‘New York City's Own Station”—810 Kc.
